subject: Golf
Records and Achievements
Age, Chronological
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko, a 15-year-old South Korean-born New Zealander, won the Canadian Women’s Open on Sunday in Coquitlam, British Columbia, to become the youngest winner on the L.P.G.A. Tour and the fifth amateur champion.
snippet: Lydia Ko, a 15-year-old South Korean-born New Zealander, won the Canadian Women’s Open on Sunday in Coquitlam, British Columbia, to become the youngest winner on the L.P.G.A. Tour and the fifth amateur champion.
